means: 忧郁症，疑病症，季肋部( hypochondrium的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: We tend to think of hypochondria as a kind of selfishness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们倾向于将强迫症视为某种自私的表现.

sentence.Network_en: Doctors in Britain long suspected that patients who wear tinted abnormally prone to depression and hypochondria.
sentence.Network_cn: 长时间以来,英国的医生认为戴墨镜的病人更易于消沉并患上忧郁症.

hypocholia 胆汁过少hypochondria 疑病hypochondriasis 疑病
臆想症(hypochondria)是一种心理症状：总是怀疑自己生了病或即将生病，因而造成一系列的精神困扰，然而对于一些作家、艺术家和 …

list.abs: left hepatic veins 肝左静脉left hypochondria 左季肋部-

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English(in the Greek sense): via late Latin from Greek hupokhondria, denoting the soft body area below the ribs, from hupo 'under' + khondros 'sternal cartilage'. Melancholy was originally thought to arise from the liver, gall bladder, spleen, etc

entry.def: If someone suffers from hypochondria, they continually worry about their health and imagine that they are ill, although there is really nothing wrong with them.

means.word_mean: 1. chronic and abnormal anxiety about imaginary symptoms and ailments

auth_sentence.content: Hypochondria is an obsession with what lurks below.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hypochondria is an obsession with what lurks below.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hypochondria is an obsession with what lurks below.

auth_sentence.content: I have found hypochondria to be rather dull and time-consuming.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have found hypochondria to be rather dull and time-consuming.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have found hypochondria to be rather dull and time-consuming.

auth_sentence.content: Modern psychology has also struggled to understand hypochondria.
auth_sentence.res_content: Modern psychology has also struggled to understand hypochondria.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Modern psychology has also struggled to understand hypochondria.

stems_affixes.word_buile: hypo在……下面,次等+derm皮+ic……的→adj.皮下的
hypo在……下面,次等+crit评判+e→在背后评判→伪君子
hypo在……下面,次等+mnes记忆+ia病→记忆变得不好
hypo在……下面,次等+tension压力[引申血压]→n.血压过低
hypo在……下面,次等+tenus边→[从上面拉到]下面→斜边
hypo在……下面,次等+thesis论文→还不是正式的理论→假说
hypo在……下面,次等+trophy营养→营养不够→[导致]发育不良
hypo在……下面,次等+chondr忧郁+ia病→在下面忧郁→忧郁症

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"病"; 2. 表名词,"总称,状态等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: a无+nem血+ia病→n.贫血,贫血症
dys坏,不良+lex词+ia病→读词不行
dys坏+peps消化;胃+ia病→消化不好
hypo在……下面+chondr忧郁+ia病→在下面忧郁→忧郁症
in不+somn睡眠+ia病→n.失眠症
pyro火+man狂+ia病→n.纵火狂
ambros不死的+ia总称,状态等→n.神仙食品,美味
corn角+u+cop丰富+ia表示物→表示丰富的角→丰饶角
in内部+sign信号+ia总称,状态等→内部标志

stems_affixes.value_cn: 知识分子[集合称],知识阶层,知识界
stems_affixes.word_buile: intelligent聪明的,伶俐的+s+ia总称,状态等→n.知识分子[集合称],知识阶层,知识界
milit兵+ia总称,状态等→n.民兵[组织]
minute细小的+ia总称,状态等→n.微枝末节,细节

stems_affixes.value_cn: 乌托邦,理想的完美境界,空想的社会改良计划
